author: ecomchaco
title: FulBit - NFT Football Game
description: There's a growing demand for sports-themed NFTs, yet the industry is lacking a good marketplace for them.
solution: Grow Cardano's NFT market to compete with the major platforms in other blockchains, by providing a popular theme for collectibles: football.
experience: Our team is made up of professionals from various fields (law, accounting, marketing, programming) all of them blockchain specialists.
